channel.title: CVE Feed for Contec Co., Ltd. -- SolarView Compact
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Contec Co., Ltd. -- SolarView Compact

item.title: CVE-2022-35239|2024-08-03T09:29:17.446Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: The image file management page of SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 Ver.7.23 and earlier, and SV-CPT-MC310F Ver.7.23 and earlier contains an insufficient verification vulnerability when uploading files. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary PHP code may be executed if a remote authenticated attacker uploads a specially crafted PHP file.
